trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents the status of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxx$xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx$xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation has completed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the operation is complete; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
